episode: Being 79 years old, I believe I have progressed to the point of contentment in my life. I feel I have all the necessities and am happy with my station in life.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I believe, being 79, that I have become content with who I am and what I have.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds like a wonderful feeling, very peaceful.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: The only real concern I have is the welfare of my children, but I believe they were taught the important things in life.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's natural to worry about them, but it sounds like you've done a great job preparing them.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: They all have good jobs and understand well, personal responsibility.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That must be a big relief for you, knowing they're self-sufficient.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes, that is part of the personal responsibility, that I have tried to impress upon them, all their lives.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's clear you've had a positive influence on them.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: They were taught at an early age to be serious about their education and all that they will ever have is up to their work ethic.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Those are valuable lessons that will serve them well throughout life.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It heartens me also that they will knowingly teach these values to their own children.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's a great legacy to pass on to the next generation.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Are you content?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm happy to see you're content, that's what matters to me right now.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: What else matters to you, I have probably said too much, about me.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Not at all, I'm happy to listen, it's been a pleasure hearing about your life.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Well, I also thank God, I feel He has accompanied me through these 79 years.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's beautiful, it's clear your faith brings you comfort and strength.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I pray very simply, most often to just say thank you, for all that I have been given.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: A grateful heart is a wonderful thing.
